casebody.data:
No. 10-98. John D. Ashcroft, Petitioner v. Abdullah al-Kidd. 562 U.S. 980, 131 S. Ct. 415,

178 L. Ed. 2d 321,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 8303. October 18, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit granted limited to Questions 1 and 2 presented by the petition.

Justice Kagan took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.

Same case below, 580 F.3d 949.
